评论概述: Identical to viral TikTok/Halara high waist button pants.
评论详情: After seeing Halara's high waisted button multiple-pocket casual pants all over TikTok, I really liked the look of them and the idea of a casual pant that was an alternative to leggings, but with the comfort of leggings. I decided to check Amazon for a similar option first since I knew returns would be easy if they didn't work out. These look identical to the viral pair at roughly half the price. They're very comfortable, true to size, and the length was perfect for me to wear with sneakers at 5'4."

Listen! When I tell you it is hard for me to buy pants that fits in my thighs and butts area or they’re to tight around my stomach , it is hard. They would fit the thighs area or the butt area and hard to zip up. These pants here are soooooo comfortable and they are very soft. I love how stretchy they are and perfect for professional pants! I ordered 4 more pairs in different colors.

I saw these in TikTok from a different brand for $40 but then I saw them here for a less price and let me tell you..they blew my mind! I work in a office and I want to look professional but I also want to be comfortable and these give me both, they are stretchy, soft, quality is super great, they have pockets (we never get pockets in our pants)!! I absolutely love them so I ordered them in more colors, so not hesite I promise you will love them. I ordered my regular size, could’ve size down but I’m glad I ordered my size.

These pants are very comfortable, and stay up if you crouch, kneel or move around. I wore them all day to work and was comfortable all day. They are super stretchy and not see through.  But lets talk about the pockets! Here's what I put in my pockets to see what would fit: a 24 oz bottle of Faygo soda, a rolled up pair of pajama pants, a hand scanner for a cash register, a fistful of candy bars, my whole hand, 2 cell phones, a highlighter. So if the fit of the pants don't sell you, the pockets should! Buy them all, they are great!

The only reason I took a star off was because these are described as work pants, or dress pants, while what they absolutely are is yoga pants. They're made from yoga material, and aside from the placket and pockets on the front, they fit exactly like straight-leg yoga pants.  That being said, I LOVE THESE. They're adorable and fun. The placket and patch pockets give them a trendy, hip look. They have a nice, comfortably snug fit around the torso and are loose fitting around the legs. The fabric is high quality and would be difficult to snag, the construction and details of the garment are excellent, and they are easy to launder - just machine wash on the delicate cycle and lay flat to dry.
I got the olive green but it's more grey. The buttons are green and the stitches too but the material is definitely not.

The JEKAOYI Women’s Casual High Waist Straight Leg Pants are a versatile addition to any wardrobe, combining comfort, style, and practicality. These stretchy button business dress work trousers are designed to meet the demands of a busy lifestyle while maintaining a polished look.  One of the most notable features of these pants is their high-waisted design, which provides excellent support and creates a flattering silhouette. The high waist offers a trendy, modern look while ensuring a comfortable fit throughout the day. The stretchy fabric is soft against the skin and allows for ease of movement, making them suitable for both work and casual outings.  The straight leg cut adds to the versatility of these trousers. Whether paired with a tailored blouse for the office or a casual tee for a day out, they can easily transition from formal to informal settings. This adaptability makes them a staple for anyone looking to streamline their wardrobe with pieces that can be styled in various ways.  Another standout aspect of the JEKAOYI pants is the inclusion of pockets. The functional pockets are a welcome addition, allowing for convenient storage of essentials like your phone or keys without sacrificing style. This practicality is especially beneficial for those who prefer hands-free convenience.  In terms of care, these trousers are easy to maintain. The fabric holds its shape well, and the colors remain vibrant after washing, ensuring that they continue to look fresh and new. The construction quality suggests durability, making them a wise investment for your closet.  The fit is generally true to size, so you can feel confident ordering your regular size. The stretch in the fabric accommodates various body shapes, providing comfort without feeling restrictive. This makes them ideal for long days at work or busy weekends.  **Key Points:** - **High-Waisted Design:** Flattering silhouette and comfortable fit. - **Stretchy Fabric:** Soft and allows for ease of movement. - **Straight Leg Cut:** Versatile for both work and casual wear. - **Functional Pockets:** Convenient for carrying small essentials. - **Easy to Care For:** Maintains shape and color after washing. - **True to Size Fit:** Accommodates various body shapes with comfort.  In summary, the JEKAOYI Women’s Casual High Waist Straight Leg Pants offer a blend of style, comfort, and practicality. Their adaptable nature and thoughtful design make them a great choice for anyone looking to enhance their wardrobe with a reliable pair of trousers that can be worn for a variety of occasions. Whether for work or play, these pants deliver on both fashion and function.
I thought these for work pants and they are so comfortable!! I also am so happy that it has front and back pockets!! They also for me great

These are extremely comfortable pants. They are stretchy and fit perfectly. They look like dressier pants. These are high waisted, straight legged, and so incredibly soft. These have mock buttons in the front and pockets on both sides. You won't get too warm in these as they are very light weight. These fit true to size and go with just about anything from dress shirts to sweaters. These come in six different colors and in sizes small to xx-large.

I am 5'1, with 28" waist and 36" hips.  I followed the sizing guide and ordered a medium.  The medium fits nice and loosely so I can get away with wearing yoga pants for office attire.  I had to hem it about 4 inches shorter, which is pretty easy since there's nothing special at the bottom of the legs.  I like the pockets and the look.  The material is thick enough that I can wear a shirt tucked in, too.  I wish there was a belt loop.

Pretty stretchy, it fit me well, maybe a little loose (I typically wear size 12 in jeans, but am short so they are a little baggy and long) definitely worth 15, super freaking comfy. I can wear it to work (McDonalds) which I love. The material is like that of leggings but it feels stronger, not sure how to describe it. They feel like they will last a long time. Definitely longer than jeans with me (I get the dreaded threads that pop out and eventually thin out the material because I have big thighs) jeans last about 2-3 months for me. These will probably last a year or two if treated well  Edit: if they rub against metal they will fuzz up and eventually fray, the metal was not even sharp. Still really comfy though

These pants are a soft stretchy material.  I know they were made as dress pants, but they have more of a workout material feel to them. They do fit true to size and washed up well after wearing.

评论概述: Not as expected but still cute
评论详情: I thought these were actual pants that buttoned up. The buttons are only for show though so these are actually just stretch pants. I don't hate them but I was looking forward to having button up trousers that are more formal. I definitely wouldn't wear these to work. They cute otherwise and fit me nicely though.
Good stretch and petite friendly.

This is a nice pair of high waisted, casual button down business pants. The only problem is that the fabric is a little rough. Fit as expected. Color/ style/ design was not as expected. From the picture online it looked like these were a softer, silkier fabric. Not a deal breaker.

For reference, I’m 5 feet tall and 120 pounds, and I ordered a medium. The waist and legs fit perfectly, but they were extremely long, so I had to cut off 4 inches and hem the bottoms to prevent them from dragging. The ad describes them as "women's casual high waist straight leg pants, stretchy button business dress work pocket trousers." However, these pants are much more casual than the description suggests, and I wouldn’t wear them to work. The pictures make the fabric seem thicker, but in reality, they’re more like thin yoga or exercise pants. Also, the buttons are purely decorative—they don’t actually fasten. You just pull the pants on. That said, the material is very soft, comfortable, and has a nice stretch. For $14.99, I would recommend them, just be aware that they’re quite thin and very casual.

These are very cute bootcut style pants. The color was nice, and the material felt soft and stretchy. I'm usually a Large in bottoms, and these fit me, but they were a little form fitting. On me, with this material, it just didn't look good. It showed every bump. It only looked flattering in the dark so, unfortunately, I won't be wearing these.
These lady’s pants are nicely tailored with a very nice material. Fits perfectly and very comfortable.

These high waisted straight leg women's business dress pants are a great choice for work. I ordered size S and they fit perfectly, are comfortable and have a nice, elegant style. The pants are stretchy, casual, button down and have practical pockets. I definitely recommend them.  Estos pantalones de vestir de negocios para mujer de cintura alta y pierna recta son una excelente opción para el trabajo.
